Altra 2021 Sustainability Report  /   INNOVATION    /  15Delivering Solutions  
through InnovationThe success 
of our growing 
product portfolio 
is predicated on our 
innovative thinking and 
unparalleled focus on 
delivering quality solutions 
for our customers.
Guided by ABS, we collaborate with 
our customers to fully understand 
the challenges they face and develop 
engineered solutions that improve 
performance, safety and efficiency across 
critical motion control and power transmission 
applications. Because virtually any application 
involving motion has the opportunity to utilize 
an Altra product, we serve a large and diverse 
set of end markets and play a mission-critical 
role in enabling manufacturers to develop best-
in-class products that withstand unique and 
complex environmental conditions. Often these 
solutions help us to improve the efficiency of 
a customer’s machine or process while also 
helping to reduce environmental impact.
